alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Fayette; Henry; Spalding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 5:58PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Spalding, southeastern Fayette, southwestern Henry and southeastern Clayton Counties through 630 PM EST ... At 558 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Irondale to Woolsey to near Digbey, and moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Griffin, McDonough, Fayetteville, Stockbridge, Hampton, Lovejoy, Locust Grove, Brooks, Woolsey, Sunny Side, Blacksville, Starrs Mill, Walker Mill, Inman, Luella, Jw Smith Reservoir, Flippen, Towalaga, Experiment, and Birdie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
